# This file is automatically generated from cmake.toml - DO NOT EDIT
# See https://github.com/build-cpp/cmkr for more information

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)

if(CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR STREQUAL CMAKE_BINARY_DIR)
	message(FATAL_ERROR "In-tree builds are not supported. Run CMake from a separate directory: cmake -B build")
endif()

# Regenerate CMakeLists.txt automatically in the root project
set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT OFF)
if(CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR STREQUAL CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR)
	set(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT ON)

	# Bootstrap cmkr
	include("CMake/cmkr.cmake" OPTIONAL RESULT_VARIABLE CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
	if(CMKR_INCLUDE_RESULT)
		cmkr()
	endif()

	# Enable folder support
	set_property(GLOBAL PROPERTY USE_FOLDERS ON)
endif()

# Create a configure-time dependency on cmake.toml to improve IDE support
if(CMKR_ROOT_PROJECT)
	configure_file(cmake.toml cmake.toml COPYONLY)
endif()

project(fuck-ms-teams
	LANGUAGES
		C
	VERSION
		1.0.0
	DESCRIPTION
		"Description of the project"
)

# Target MinHook
set(CMKR_TARGET MinHook)
set(MinHook_SOURCES "")

list(APPEND MinHook_SOURCES
	"libraries/MinHook/build/CMakeFiles/3.25.0-rc4/CompilerIdC/CMakeCCompilerId.c"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/buffer.c"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/hde/hde32.c"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/hde/hde64.c"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/hook.c"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/trampoline.c"
	"libraries/MinHook/include/MinHook.h"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/MinHook.h"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/buffer.h"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/hde/hde32.h"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/hde/hde64.h"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/hde/pstdint.h"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/hde/table32.h"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/hde/table64.h"
	"libraries/MinHook/src/trampoline.h"
)

list(APPEND MinHook_SOURCES
	cmake.toml
)

set(CMKR_SOURCES ${MinHook_SOURCES})
add_library(MinHook STATIC)

if(MinHook_SOURCES)
	target_sources(MinHook PRIVATE ${MinHook_SOURCES})
endif()

source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${MinHook_SOURCES})

target_include_directories(MinHook PUBLIC
	${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
)

unset(CMKR_TARGET)
unset(CMKR_SOURCES)

# Target fuck-ms-teams
set(CMKR_TARGET fuck-ms-teams)
set(fuck-ms-teams_SOURCES "")

list(APPEND fuck-ms-teams_SOURCES
	"src/lib.c"
	"libraries/MinHook/include/MinHook.h"
)

list(APPEND fuck-ms-teams_SOURCES
	cmake.toml
)

set(CMKR_SOURCES ${fuck-ms-teams_SOURCES})
add_library(fuck-ms-teams SHARED)

if(fuck-ms-teams_SOURCES)
	target_sources(fuck-ms-teams PRIVATE ${fuck-ms-teams_SOURCES})
endif()

source_group(TREE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} FILES ${fuck-ms-teams_SOURCES})

target_link_libraries(fuck-ms-teams PUBLIC
	MinHook
)

unset(CMKR_TARGET)
unset(CMKR_SOURCES)
